title: Visual Alerts with Custom Vision and IoT
description:
In this episode we'll learn how to build a "Visual Alert" for your IoT camera. We will use Custom Vision from Azure Cognitive Services to train an image classifier for a particular camera, and export that ONNX model to run locally on an IoT device. Our device will send events back to Azure IoT Hub. The end to end code is available on GitHub for your to try along at home.

Learn More: 
Visual Intelligence: https://aka.ms/visualintelligence 
Docs: Cognitive Services Vision Solution Templates: https://aka.ms/visionsolutiontemplates 
Docs: Custom Vision: https://aka.ms/customvisiondocs
